title: In which month will the NIOS exam be held next? - Quora

response.answer_text: The NIOS exams for Class 12 will commence fromApril 2 and conclude on April 29 while for Class 10 the exams will be held between April 3 and 29, 2019. The exams will be conducted from 2: 30 to 5:30 pm. For overseas candidates , the exams for Class 10 will begin on April 4 and for Class 12 it will begin fromApril 2. As on Feb 28, 2019
